WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
VESSEL SINUELO DO MAR REPORTS
CREWMAN REQUIRING MEDICAL ASSISTANCE
IN 24-29S 046-37W. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
VESSELS IN VICINITY ABLE TO PROVIDE MEDICAL
ASSISTANCE REQUESTED TO ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
